snippet: U.K. Financial Investments, which oversees the holdings, plans to sell a 5.2 percent stake in a private placement to institutional investors.
abstract: DealBook Online; Britain says it will sell 5.2 percent stake in Royal Bank of Scotland.
lead_paragraph: U.K. Financial Investments, which oversees the holdings, plans to sell a 5.2 percent stake in a private placement to institutional investors.

headline.main: British Government to Begin Partial Sale of R.B.S. Stake
